subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Terrelle Pryor, a quarterback from Pennsylvania, has decided to attend Ohio State where he will play football, spurning Bit 10 rivals Michigan, Penn State and Pac-10 school Oregon.
snippet: Terrelle Pryor, a quarterback from Pennsylvania, has decided to attend Ohio State where he will play football, spurning Bit 10 rivals Michigan, Penn State and Pac-10 school Oregon.
